name: The Backwards RPG
description:
This game was posted for the Mini Jam 73: Power.

The limitation was the use of 5 colors maximum during each scene.

This Game goal is to level your character down. You start at the last level with a complete skill tree. Then by killing monsters you lose experience and then, when you level up, you take out a skill from the tree.

The game start is a very silly grindy RPG while in the end it becomes a resorce-management game.
